34.eng-name: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten
34.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح وما يؤكل من الحيوان

hadiths.text: Hishim b. Zaid b. Anas b. Milik reported:I visited the house of al-Hakam b. Ayyub along with my grandfather Anas b. Milik, (and there) some people had made a hen a target and were shooting arrows at her. Thereupon Asas said that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) had forbidden tying of the animals (and making them the targets of arrows, etc)

chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of cornering animals in order to kill them (for sport)
